definitions.definition: A time limit given for payment of an account for produce purchased, this limit varying with different goods.
A sequence of characters that appears on a monitor to indicate that the computer is ready to receive input.
definitions.example: I filled in my name where the prompt appeared on the computer screen but my account wasn't recognized.

definitions.definition: (writing) A suggestion for inspiration given to an author.
To lead (someone) toward what they should say or do.
definitions.example: I prompted him to get a new job.

definitions.definition: To show or tell an actor/person the words they should be saying, or actions they should be doing.
definitions.example: If he forgets his words I will prompt him.

definitions.definition: To initiate; to cause or lead to.

definitions.example: He was very prompt at getting a new job.
